seine: Semiparametric Ecological Inference

Source: R/seine-package.R
seine-package.Rd

Efficient and user-friendly routines for modern ecological inference. Implements the methods described in McCartan & Kuriwaki (2025) arXiv:2507.XXXXX, which generalize ecological regression as introduced by Goodman (1953) doi:10.2307/2088121 . Includes routines for preprocessing, synthetic data generation, double/debiased machine learning (DML) estimation, and sensitivity analysis.
